item.description: Welcome to Episode 2 of the Power Platform Clinic with Duncan and Ian! In this episode: ‚úÖ Validating Email Domains with Power Automate Ian shares a powerful, free way to validate email domains using Power Automate, showing: Why validating the entire email address is tricky without sending a link How to split out the domain using the split function Using the CheckDomain connector to confirm whether a domain exists and can receive emails How this approach avoids the costs of third-party services and can be used with data from anywhere: Dataverse, Excel, or SharePoint Ian walks through building the flow step by step, demonstrating how it splits the email, checks the domain, and writes the result back to a field in Dataverse to clean up data input.
